About

I am a third-year Ph.D. student at Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST), advised by Prof. Kimin Lee and Prof. Jinwoo Shin. My research focuses on enhancing the efficiency and controllability of generative models, with a primary focus on image and video diffusion models.
